name: Project Puzzle (MyNameIsToday)
description:
You are our tester for this new universe! Unfortunately, we messed up and you are stuck. Find the escape as soon as possible, good luck!

YOU WONT ESCAPE

This is a puzzle game I made for my first public game! It won't have much since it's my first released game, but right you just need to get through some rooms with different mechanics to help you escape.

(Hopefully) Coming Soon: Monster Boss AI, Complete Left Direction, ?Secret Door?

Please donate, this is my first public game, and I struggled a little with finding answers. It would be great if you donated to me, you don't have to, but I was just asking :)

THERE WILL BE LOTS OF BUGS!

DO NOT READ, USELESS INFO!
